attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Generate Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 telemetry configuration for ACL operational counters (hit counts per ACE and interface bindings). Use gRPC with no TLS. Server 192.0.2.114 port 57500. Choose relevant sensor-paths."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group ACL-COUNTERS
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-tc-oper:traffic-collector/afs/af/counters
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-tc-oper:traffic-collector/vrf-table/default-vrf/afs/af/counters
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.114
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-ACL-COUNTERS
  sensor-group-id ACL-COUNTERS sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
